metadata.title: CVE-2023-4073 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in ANGLE in Google Chrome on Mac prior to115.0.5790.170 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
